data.text: Hiwa thengli kei'n mangtalar inkhat-ah marwaanna kot inlong inkhat kaleimu.
Khawapha takkhan kei'n ratha-ah kaleiom. Kama-ah kaom marwaan khan reng in-ongna munkhan miring inkhat in-ongnga om. Ezek 1:26-28; 10:1
Ama meel kha lungman katam jasper li carnelian iwar angnga awar, halli reng in-ong munkha emerald jia ka-ang sumneisaaang in akahiil.
Reng in-ongna mun kakahiil khan reng in-ongna mun soomni leimili um om, khawa mun ngaikhan upa soomni leimili in puondiar kabang khat-um soonna renglukhu inkhu-ah in-in-ong.

Reng in-ongna mun makheiya kool-inlek, rasa intir, khat-um ruo inri rasa ngaikha aheisuok. Reng in-ongna mun ma-ah meiser sari kaiya om, khawa ngaikha Pathian ratha sari ngaikha in-eii. Suok 19:16; Chonglar 1:4; 8:5; 11:18; Ezek 1:13; Zech 4:2
Khale inruoiya reng in-ongna mun ma-ah crystal inthiang angnga inthiang meengsial tuipui ka-ang inkhat um om.
Mansa kha sabakkai ang; inni huuina kha saraatchal ang; inthum huuina kha miring maisuo ang; halli mili huuina kha murmu kawuong ang. Ezek 1:5-10; 10:14
Akaring khouring mili ngaikha inmurtha kuruk indouwiak, innuk inma inpum paraangnga imit indou halli suun zaan boiya laa insakkha minchatmu:
Akaring khouring mili ngai'n reng in-ongna munna in-ong kumsoot-ah akaring amadiang minlurna, khoya thona khat-um minpaakna laa insak rachamma,
upa soomni leimili ngaikhan reng in-ongna munna in-ong kumsoot-ah karing amadiang inbok-ah chubei intho. Inmani ngai'n inreng lukhu kha inliik-ah reng in-ongna ma-ah inreiiya inti,
